description: A collection of dereferenced item records

dereferencedItems.description: List of dereferenced item records. Dereferenced means that related record data is added (instanceRecord, holdingsRecord, materialType, permanentLoanType, temporaryLoanType, permanentLocation, temporaryLocation, effectiveLocation) and id fields are removed (holdingsRecordId, instanceId, materialTypeId, permanentLocationId, temporaryLocationId, effectiveLocationId, permanentLoanTypeId, temporaryLoanTypeId).

totalRecords.description: Estimated or exact total number of records
